message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. It's a fair price considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay a fair price for the product, but I'm on a budget. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $82. It's a fair compromise considering the product's value to you.
